about_the_game:
From the fusion of dice games and deckbuilders rises a brand-new dice-builder. Embark on a crazy roguelike adventure with ramping relics and (literally) exploding dice, or challenge your friends in local multiplayer with more than 5 unique characters.

In this chaotic dice game, players battle by throwing their dice onto a board. But by hitting the other dice on the board you can change their values to your advantage, introducing an element of strategy on top of the luck present. At the end of the dice-throwing phase, each die will defend or attack the corresponding player. Battle until one or more players go down!

Venture out into the world of Dice and meet a bunch of weird faces, each of them ready for a brawl. Throughout your roguelike adventure, you collect new dice,

upgrade them to create stronger new ones, collect a bunch of powerful relics, and face powerful foes as you progress through each character's story.

One run might not succeed, but every run unlocks new items and dice for you to utilize on your next adventure. Powerful bosses await at the end, ready to join your roster once you've proven your skills.

Fudgy Dice features a cast of more than 5 colorful characters, each with their unique dice, special abilities, and playstyle. Whether you choose to play through their tale, or utilize them to battle in versus mode. Remember to try them all to find your favorite.

Choose one of more than 15 different special dice to throw at your opponent. Freeze, copy, or even destroy your opponent's dice, but remember no die exists without its counters. Utilize your special dice along with your special abilities and skills to create a winning strategy.

  • A cast of more than 5 colorful playable characters each with their unique special skills

  • More than 15 special dice, each with their unique effects

  • A cute and colorful pixel-art-style by Amine El Bouhattaoui

  • More than 20 different relics to discover and collect

  • A lighthearted but chaotic story

  • Endless fun solo and with friends
